translations.english: Said: "If the illness can be cured say it can be cured. If not, say it cannot be cured."

translations.chinese: 於 是上嫚罵之，曰：「吾以布衣提三尺取天下，此非天命乎？
translations.english: So the emperor insulted him, saying: "I from commoner status, wielding a three-foot sword took the world. Is this not Heaven's mandate?
The mandate is in Heaven. Though Bian Que came, what benefit!"

translations.chinese: 遂不使治疾，賜黃金五十斤，罷之。
translations.english: So he did not have him treat the illness, granted fifty jin of gold, and dismissed him.

translations.chinese: 呂后問曰：「陛下百歲後，蕭相國既死， 誰令代之？」
translations.english: Empress Lü asked: "After Your Majesty reaches a hundred years, when Chancellor Xiao dies, who should replace him?"
